duties_responsibilities.duty: Research, troubleshoot, and resolve ADP/client application issues in the areas of system setup, product functionality, product enhancements, and general client inquiries.
Communicate with customers and representatives to resolve issues, set priorities, organize your day, multi-task, change direction, and provide prompt follow-up.
Educate clients and provide recommendations using ADP product and services knowledge to solve issues and questions and help build client understanding around our products' value.

education_certification.credential: Prior client service or systems integration experience. A college degree is great but not required.
